entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
